name: AFGBuildableSpaceElevator
comment: Copyright 2016-2018 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: IsFullyUpgraded
methods.comment: @returns true when we are fully upgraded.

methods.name: GetNextPhaseCost
methods.comment: Returns the cost for the next upgrade

methods.name: PayOffFromInventory
methods.comment: Player has dropped items onto the pay off widget from their inventory

methods.name: IsReadyToUpgrade
methods.comment: @returns True if we have eaten up all the items needed to upgrade. Returns false if not, but also if there is no current recipe available.

methods.name: GetInputInventory
methods.comment: Get the input inventory from this building.

methods.name: UpgradeTowTruck
methods.comment: Called when the player presses to send more stuff to the tow truck

methods.name: LaunchTowTruck
methods.comment: When the player is on the last step of the game, sending the tow truck will end the game

methods.name: GetGamePhaseManager
methods.comment: Returns the game phase manager, finds it if it isn't cached

methods.name: ConsumeInputIngredientsIfNecessary
methods.comment: Checks and consumes any ingredient in the input inventory if the upgrade recipe requires it.

properties.name: mInputInventory
properties.comment: Our input inventory, shared for all input connections.

properties.name: mGamePhaseManager
properties.comment: A cached version of the game phase manager

properties.name: mInputConnections
properties.comment: Cached input connections (No need for UPROPERTY as they are referenced in component array)
